trans-unit.source: The exception that is thrown when a <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping.Send*> or <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping.SendAsync*> method calls a method that throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: Unntak forårsakes når en <> </> *> eller <> </> *> metoden kaller en metode som oppstår det et unntak.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping> class throws this exception to indicate that while sending an Internet Control Message Protocol (ICMP) Echo request, a method called by the <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping> class threw an unhandled exception.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping>klassen oppstår dette unntaket for å angi at under sending av en forespørsel om Internet Control Message Protocol (ICMP) Oppdater kalte en metode den <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping>klassen forårsaket et ubehandlet unntak.</xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping> </xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping>

trans-unit.source: Applications should check the inner exception of a PingException object to identify the problem.
trans-unit.target: Programmer skal se det indre unntaket for en PingException-objektet til å identifisere problemet.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping> class does not throw this exception if the ICMP Echo request fails because of network, ICMP, or destination errors.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping>klassen ikke slette dette unntaket hvis forespørselen ICMP oppdatering mislykkes på grunn av nettverket, ICMP eller mål.</xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping>

trans-unit.source: For such errors, the <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping> class returns a <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply> object with the relevant <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.IPStatus> value set in the <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.Status%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: For slike feil i <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping>klasse returnerer en <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply>objekt med den aktuelle <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.IPStatus>verdien angitt i den <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.Status%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.Status%2A> </xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.IPStatus> </xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply> </xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingException"></xref> class using the specified message.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingException"> </xref> klasse ved hjelp av den angitte meldingen.

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes the <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property with the text in the `message` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Denne konstruktøren initialiserer den <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>egenskapen med teksten i den `message` parameteren.</xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingException"></xref> class with serialized data.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingException"> </xref> klasse serialiserte dataene.

trans-unit.source: This constructor is called during deserialization to reconstitute a previously serialized <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingException> object.
trans-unit.target: Denne konstruktøren kalles under deserialisering til reconstitute tidligere serialiserte <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingException>objektet.</xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingException>

trans-unit.source: The object that holds the serialized object data.
trans-unit.target: Objektet som har datatypen serialiserte objektet.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> that specifies the contextual information about the source or destination for this serialization.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>som angir kontekstavhengig informasjon om kilden eller målet for denne serialisering.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingException"></xref> class using the specified message and inner exception.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingException"> </xref> klasse ved hjelp av angitte melding og indre unntaket.

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes the <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property with the text in the `message` parameter, and the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property with the `innerException` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Denne konstruktøren initialiserer den <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>egenskapen med teksten i den `message` parameteren og <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>egenskapen med den `innerException` parameteren.</xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> </xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>

trans-unit.source: The exception that causes the current exception.
trans-unit.target: Unntaket som fører til at den gjeldende unntaket.
